trans-unit.source: Represents an object type that has a width, height, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref> such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示有宽度、 高度的对象类型和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref>如<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个抽象类。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the height of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，度量值的单位获取图像的高度 (英寸的&96;ths)。

trans-unit.source: The height of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的高度。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref> associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref>与映像相关联。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: 与映像关联的元数据。

trans-unit.source: Converts pixels to DIPs in a way that is consistent with MIL.
trans-unit.target: 与 MIL 一致的方式转换 Dip 像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bitmap, in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 位图，以每英寸点数的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bitmap, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 位图，以像素为单位的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The natural size of the bitmap in MIL Device Independent Pixels (DIPs, or 1/96").
trans-unit.target: MIL 设备独立像素为单位 （Dip，即 1/96"） 中的位图原始大小。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式的当前实例的值设置。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: -空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 使用的类型定义的默认格式<xref:System.IFormattable>实现。</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于设置值的格式提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 来从操作系统的当前区域设置获取数字格式信息。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式中的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 创建此对象基于当前区域性的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> passed in.
trans-unit.target: 创建基于<xref:System.IFormatProvider>传递单元</xref:System.IFormatProvider>此对象的字符串表示

trans-unit.source: If the provider is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture*> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供程序<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture*>使用。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IFormatProvider> that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IFormatProvider>，它提供区域性特定格式设置信息。</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此对象的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the width of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，度量值的单位获取图像的宽度 (96ths 的英寸)。

trans-unit.source: The width of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 度量值单元中的图像的宽度 (96ths 的英寸)。
